title: Election Officials Say Efforts to Bolster the Voting System Worked
description: Officials were braced for partisan poll monitors convinced of fraud to disrupt voting in the midterm elections. While there were scattered episodes, the vote went smoothly.
dc:creator: Alexandra Berzon and Ken Bensinger

media:content.media:credit: Alisha Jucevic for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Mail-in ballots were sorted for processing at the Maricopa County Elections Center in Phoenix on Tuesday.
